subject: Congratulations: I'm deligh
body:
Congratulations: I'm delighted to inform you that your Facebook name
was selected among the 20 lucky winners that won the huge sum of
$500.000.00 USD in the ongoing Facebook international lottery
Promotion.
Reply to my email for more information: 
facebook.agent@lottoclaimsfb.com
Mr Bodnar Tom

subject: Re:    Congratulations: I'm deligh
body:
Hello Mr. Bodnar Tom,

Wow, that sounds like an amazing opportunity! I can't believe I've been selected as one of the lucky winners. Can you tell me more about this Facebook lottery promotion? How does it work exactly?

Best wishes,
Lucille
